30030000.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> where are you going... we need to eat.
30030000.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 希望 </> 你去哪儿了……我要吃饭了.

30030001.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> will do well in heaven, right?
30030001.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 希望</>在天上一切顺利吧?

30030002.English_Text:
I want to help my colleagues, but... 
Let's focus on patrolling for now.
30030002.Chinese_Text:
我想帮助我的同事们... 
我们现在专注于巡逻.

30030003.English_Text: Help me. I don't want to go inside...

30030004.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Anger gnats</> These guys... 
I'm going to die because of them.
30030004.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿小丑</>这些家伙…… 
我要死在这些家伙身上了.

30030006.English_Text:
Poison or medicine! 
It depends on how you use it.
30030006.Chinese_Text:
是毒药还是药? 
 视用途而定.

30030007.English_Text: Amazing. Try it wrapped in vegetables!
30030007.Chinese_Text: 太奇妙了.把它包在蔬菜里,享受吧!

30030008.Original_Text: 그 녀석 어쩌다... 거기에 발령이 났을까?
30030008.English_Text: How did he... how did he get a job there?
30030008.Chinese_Text: 他是怎么……他是怎么在那里找到工作的?

30030009.English_Text: I've come all the way here, shall I try?
30030009.Chinese_Text: 我大老远的来了,你要不要走?

30030010.English_Text:
Even after a long time... 
It's still a beautiful place.
30030010.Chinese_Text:
好久不见…… 
还是很美的地方.

30030011.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daeseong of Paradise</>! Let's figure out how you feel today!
30030011.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>天堂的大城</>!让我们看看你今天的感受吧!

30030012.Original_Text: 난 몰라. 나한테 말 걸지 마.
30030012.English_Text: I don't know. Don't talk to me.

30030013.Original_Text: 요즘 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>그 커다란 개</>는 왜 안 보이지?
30030013.English_Text: Why can't I see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>that big dog</> these days?
30030013.Chinese_Text: 为什么我这几天看不到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>那只大狗</>?

30030014.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</>? 가끔 산책할 때 나보고 인사하고 그랬는데...
30030014.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>hope</>? Sometimes when I was walking, she greeted me and said hello...
30030014.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>希望</>?有时候出去散步的时候,看着我打招呼……

30030015.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>희망이</>는 날 더 좋아해. \n나만 보면 맨날 달려온다고!
30030015.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Hope</> likes me more.
He runs to me every day when he sees me!
30030015.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 希望</>更喜欢我. 
如果你看到我,他们每天都跑来跑去!

30030016.Original_Text: 우리가 모든 걸 다 지켜낼 순 없어. \n적당히 하자.
30030016.English_Text:
We can't protect everything.
Let's do it in moderation.
30030016.Chinese_Text:
我们无法保护一切. 
 我们要适度.

30030017.Original_Text: 모든 것을 다 지켜낼 순 없지만... \n최선을 다하자.
30030017.English_Text:
We can't protect everything, but... 
Let's do our best.
30030017.Chinese_Text:
我们不能保护一切,但是... 
我们尽力而为.

30030018.Original_Text: 진지하게... \n여길 더 순찰해야 한다면 수양 관둬야지.
30030018.English_Text:
Seriously... 
If you need to patrol the streets more, you should quit training.
30030018.Chinese_Text:
说真的... 
如果你需要更多地在街上巡逻,你应该停止寄养.

30030019.English_Text: How did you get assigned to such a place?
30030019.Chinese_Text: 你是怎么被安排在这里的?

30030020.Original_Text: 야. 농사 적당히 짓자. \n너희들은 너무 열심히 해.
30030020.English_Text:
Hey, let's farm moderately. 
You guys work too hard.
30030020.Chinese_Text:
嘿.让我们适度耕作. 
你们太辛苦了.

30030021.Original_Text: 뽑을 수 있을 때 최대한 뽑아 내야지.
30030021.English_Text: You should draw as many as you can while you can.

30030022.English_Text:
Many people and supplies come and go. 
It should be that safe.
30030022.Chinese_Text:
成千上万的人和货物来来去去. 
 一定是那么安全.

30030023.Chinese_Text: 把基地的防御交给我们.

30030024.English_Text: If you commit a crime, you should be paid.
30030024.Chinese_Text: 如果犯罪,就必须付出代价.

30030025.English_Text: There is nothing wrong with work!

30030026.Original_Text: 어디 으슥한 데 가서 좀 쉬다 올까...
30030026.English_Text: Shall we go somewhere gloomy and get some rest...
30030026.Chinese_Text: 要不我们去黑暗的某个地方休息一下……

30030027.Original_Text: 언제 오냥! 난 관대하다냥... 참는 거다냥!
30030027.English_Text: When will you come! I'm generous... I'm patient!
30030027.Chinese_Text: 你什么时候来!我很慷慨……我很有耐心!

30030028.English_Text: I don't know when it will come out again... be careful.
30030028.Chinese_Text: 不知道什么时候又出来了……小心点.

30030029.Original_Text: 왜 이렇게 피곤하지? 몸이 너무 무겁네...
30030029.English_Text: Why are you so tired? You're too heavy...
30030029.Chinese_Text: 你为什么这么累?我太重了...

30030031.English_Text: Won't the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradises</> suddenly attack with your troops?

30030033.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비경의 자드락</>이 어디지? \n거의 다 온 것 같은데...
30030033.English_Text:
Where is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Unexpected Jadrak</>?
I think I'm almost there...
30030033.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>隐藏的宝石</>在哪里? 
 我想我快到了...

30030034.English_Text: How can I not make the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Parbalgi</> extinct?

30030036.English_Text:
Now, until the passage is raided...?
A countermeasure must be taken.

30030037.Original_Text: 하, 꺼림칙하군. 근데 왜 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님 \n모습을 한 환영은 없는 거지?
30030037.English_Text:
Hey, you're reluctant. But why don't you see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>PerongPerong</>
Illustration of it?
30030037.Chinese_Text:
하, 꺼림칙하군. 근데 왜 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님 
모습을 한 환영은 없는 거지?

30030038.English_Text:
I'm so worried...
Aren't the other barongs scary...?
30030038.Chinese_Text:
너무 걱정된다냥...
다른 바롱들은 안 무서운가냥...?

30030039.Original_Text: 아니, 이걸 어떻게 오늘 안으로\n준비하라는 거야?
30030039.English_Text:
No, how are you going to
prepare this today?
30030039.Chinese_Text:
아니, 이걸 어떻게 오늘 안으로
준비하라는 거야?

30030040.Original_Text: 올해 유독 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</> 준비가 오래 걸리네.\n뭔가 뾰족한 수가 필요하겠어.
30030040.English_Text:
This year's special <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sunrise</> takes a long time to prepare.
I'm going to need something sharp.
30030040.Chinese_Text:
올해 유독 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>해맞이 행사</> 준비가 오래 걸리네.
뭔가 뾰족한 수가 필요하겠어.

30030041.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>... 이렇게 빠르게 세를 확장하다니.\n어떻게 된 일이지?
30030041.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</>... How did you expand the number so quickly.
How did it happen?
30030041.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>... 이렇게 빠르게 세를 확장하다니.
어떻게 된 일이지?

30030042.English_Text: Hey, what's wrong with this! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</>what's wrong!!
